instruction: Create a detailed character description for the protagonist of a novel
output: John is a 20-year-old man of average height and slim build. He has brown hair, which is kept neatly cut, and his green eyes are full of determination and curiosity. He often wears a T-shirt and jeans, with a backpack straps around his shoulders. He has an intelligent and analytical mind, and loves to learn new skills and explore the world around him. He is loyal to those he loves and never afraid to take on a difficult challenge.
